submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        from collections import defaultdict
        import bisect
        m = defaultdict(list)
        v = []
        for i in range(len(nums) // 2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[len(nums) - i - 1]
            diff = abs(a - b)     
            X = max(a, b, k - a, k - b)
            m[diff].append(X)
            v.append(X)  
        ans = len(nums)
        v.sort()
        for diff, values in m.items():
            p = bisect.bisect_left(v, diff)
            p = p * 2 + (len(nums) // 2 - p)
            for X in values:
                if X < diff:
                    p -= 2
                else:
                    p -= 1
            ans = min(ans, p)
        return ans
